description: Installation of drywall sheets on metal or wooden frame. Includes marking, mounting profiles, sheet installation and preparation for finishing.
Painting of interior and exterior walls. Surface preparation (puttying, sanding), priming, applying paint in two coats.
Installation of ceramic tiles on floor and walls. Marking, surface preparation, adhesive application, tile installation with alignment, grouting.
Installation of sockets, switches, light fixtures. Cable routing, installation of junction boxes, connection to distribution board.
Installation of plumbing fixtures: sinks, toilets, bathtubs, shower cabins. Connection to water supply and sewerage, sealing of joints.
Dismantling of interior partitions made of brick, drywall, concrete. Includes demolition, removal of construction debris, preparation of openings.
External wall insulation using mineral wool or expanded polystyrene. Insulation mounting, reinforcement, plaster application.
Installation of PVC or wooden windows. Measurement, removal of old windows, installation of new ones with alignment, sealing and finishing of slopes.
Wall leveling with plaster. Priming, installation of beacons, applying plaster mortar, troweling and sanding surface.
Installation of laminate on prepared base. Underlay installation, marking, cutting and panel installation, baseboard installation.
